page.title: 11 AGRICULTURE B.ASH/C.FENTON
page.content:
The area is mainly {arable farming, the average farm size is 138.2 acres.The farmers don't employ many people,the average being only one. The most common piece of machinery is the tractor.Most farms don't hire anything but between three other farms they hire 2 sugar beet lifters,1 combine harvester,1 grain drier and a wagon. On the farm the busiest time of year is harvest time,when the crops have to be collected and sold to companies.The main crops are wheat, barley,potatoes but some rape and grass.Wheat provides the most income.
Barkston Ash drainage is good because the soil is made of{limestone but in Church Fenton the soil is hard and made of{clay}so it isn't well drained land.
